title: Holy Cow this Black Cleaver + IBG Ezreal build works
body:
Once you get IBG and Phage, if you can hit your Q you're even more uncatchable because while slowing them down it's speeding you up almost like an Ahri Q.  If you got skill in skillshots and they don't have insane gap closers, you are literally uncatchable.  Not to mention the BC passive is pretty sweet if you got AS from passive and build and can stack that armour pen.  Goodbye tanks

Oh, and I went Legendary against a Jinx with it.  Feels good ^_^
